Title: The Dynamic Duo
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Andrew Secunda, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam and Pops debate the newest Batman film while Erica goes on a college interview.
